f = 0.81 (30% Ethyl acetate in Hexane); FT-IR (KBr, cm −1): 1648 (C=O), 1607 (Ar C=C), 1512 (CH=CH), 1232 (-CF3), 3015 (Ar C-H stretching), 1156 (-C-O-), 840 (C-Cl); 1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl 3, ppm), δ: 7.37 (1H, d, J = 16.3 Hz, -CO-CH=), 8.02 (1H, d, J = 16.2 Hz, Ar-CH=), 7.70–8.22 (4H, m, C-2′, 3′, 5′, 6′, Ar-H), 7.05–7.68 (4H, m, C-3″, 4″, 5″, 6″, Ar-H); ESI-MS: 343.58 [M + H] +.
